code: var seededRandom=function seededRandom(seed){var m=Math.pow(2,35)-31;var a=185852;var s=seed%m;return function(){return(s=s*a%m)/m;};};export var fetchAPI=function fetchAPI(date){var result=[];var random=seededRandom(date.getDate());for(var i=17;i<=23;i++){if(random()<0.5){result.push(i+':00');}if(random()<0.5){result.push(i+':30');}}return result;};export var submitAPI=function submitAPI(formData){return true;};
